title: The SD Padres' Fan on Twitter
body: A new plastic straw law had unexpected consequences when a man lashed out at a worker at a fast food chain. The Florida man had just gotten his order Monday evening at a McDonald's in St. Petersburg. He got upset when there weren't any plastic straws out at the condiment station, witness Brenda Biandudi told CNN.
readable_content:
🅸🆃 🅵 🅲🅽🆃🅴🆇🆃 @TheSDPadresFan (2023-12-08): (January 2019) St. Petersburg, Florida - A man attacked a McDonald’s employee over a straw and she fought back.

A new plastic straw law had unexpected consequences when a man lashed out at a worker at a fast food chain.

- - -
summary:
The post describes an incident where a man attacked a McDonald's employee over a straw due to a new plastic straw law. The tone of the post is concerning as it highlights the unexpected consequences of the law. 

Sentiment: -0.7
